comment.text: This translation key is used to display a descriptive text next to examples of ready-to-use integrations of a specific product. It appears on a UI element in the developer tools section, likely as a header or caption, and provides context for users to understand the content of the integration examples.

usage.context:
>
 <CategoryHeader className="integration-header">
 {t("IntegrationExamples")}
 </CategoryHeader>
 <Text lineHeight="20px" color={theme.sdkPresets.secondaryColor}>
 {t("IntegrationDescription", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })}
 </Text>
 <div className="icons">
 <div className="icon" title={zoomTitle}>
 <ReactSVG
 className="icon-zoom"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "すぐに使える{{productName}}の統合機能を確認する" is technically correct but a more natural phrasing would be "{{productName}}の統合機能を確認します" or "{{productName}}の統合機能が利用可能か確認する". The current phrasing 'すぐに使える' (sugu ni tsukaeru - immediately usable) is a bit too literal and slightly awkward in this context.
The phrase "ກວດ​ສອບ" (guatสอบ) can be interpreted as 'inspect' or 'examine' rather than 'check'. 'Check' implies a verification process, which is more accurate for the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "ກວດແກ້" (guat gae) or "ຕ້ອນກວດ" (ton guat) for a closer equivalent of 'check' in this context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the use of "{{productName}}" is technically correct, it might be more natural in Lao to insert the product name directly into the translated text if the context allows. This can improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: If possible, replace "{{productName}}" with the actual product name. Example: 'ກວດ​ສອບ​ການ​ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ [Product Name] ທີ່​ພ້ອມ​ສໍາລັບ​ການ​ນໍາ​ໃຊ້'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'prontas a usar' is a literal translation of 'ready-to-use' and sounds slightly awkward in Portuguese. A more natural phrasing would be 'prontas para usar'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verifique as integrações {{productName}} prontas para usar

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'soluții' (solutions) doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'integrations' in this context. While it's related, 'integrări' would be a more direct and accurate translation.
The word 'භාවිතයට' is potentially incorrect. It seems to be a combination of 'භාවිත' (use) and the dative suffix '-යට'. A more natural phrasing might be 'භාවිත කළ හැකි'.
The sentence structure feels slightly awkward. A more fluent phrasing might be achieved by reordering the words.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: භාවිතයට සූදානම් {{productName}} ඒකාබද්ධ කිරීම් පරීක්ෂා කරන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Проверите готове интеграције {{productName}}' while understandable, doesn't perfectly convey the nuance of 'Check ready-to-use {{productName}} integrations'. A more natural translation would emphasize the 'ready-to-use' aspect. The current translation simply says 'Check ready integrations'.
The word 'gotove' should ideally be 'pripremljene' for a more natural flow. While 'gotove' isn't *incorrect*, 'pripremljene' implies readiness more directly in this context.

The translation 'Kiểm tra các tích hợp {{productName}} có sẵn để sử dụng' is a bit wordy and not as concise as the English 'Check ready-to-use {{productName}} integrations'. While technically correct, it can be improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kiểm tra tích hợp {{productName}} sẵn có
